name: Shrunk (M1chaelDev, dav)
description:
*Headphones Recommended*

This is a submission to the Newbies Game Jam 2022-1 based on the theme, minimalism. An additional challenge I used is 'You are Alone".

NOTE: If the web version is buggy, I suggest you download the application below.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Description:

Solve puzzles by shrinking to get to places you could never reach.

When small, you move faster, but harder to control.

When you're big, movement is slower but it's easier to control and you can jump higher.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Controls:

A/D or Arrow Keys - Move

Spacebar - Jump

W - Shrink

Q - Unshrink

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
